description: A professional radio traffic, scheduling, and automation system built to integrate LibreTime and AzuraCast for GayPHX Radio.

epics.name: Music Library & Metadata Control
epics.goal: Enable metadata tagging, track type management, and nightly synchronization between LibreTime and LibreLog.

epics.name: Daypart Templates (Radio Clocks)
epics.goal: Allow producers to build and manage clock templates for different parts of the day.

epics.name: Traffic & Commercial Management
epics.goal: Handle ad campaigns, PSAs, and rotation logic for local advertisers and sponsors.

epics.name: Voice Tracking Integration
epics.goal: Integrate short-form voice breaks and future live-tracking support via LibreTalk.

epics.name: Log Builder (Automation Scheduler)
epics.goal: Automatically build and export 24-hour broadcast logs with proper spacing and fallback.

epics.name: Reporting & Compliance
epics.goal: Provide reconciled playback and schedule data for reporting and licensing compliance.

epics.name: Integration Layer
epics.goal: Centralize API and authentication logic for LibreTime, AzuraCast, and LibreTalk.

epics.name: Admin & Security
epics.goal: Implement secure authentication, authorization, and auditing features.

deliverables: Web dashboard for scheduling and automation control
